caller_intent: Albert wants to update his insurance deductible from $2500 to $3000 to lower his premium, as discussed in a prior conversation.
resolution_steps: Heather confirms the requested deductible change from $2500 to $3000.
She processes the change to take effect on the renewal date.
Informs Albert he will receive a new bill reflecting the updated terms.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance deductibles and premium calculations
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance policy management system (implied through conversation)
summary: Heather assists Albert in updating his insurance deductible from $2500 to $3000 as part of his policy renewal. The change is processed to lower his premium, and Albert is informed he will receive a new bill. The conversation confirms the adjustment but does not resolve all billing questions immediately.
